title: Roger - David Langston's "Homage"
description: David Langston has been quietly demolishing H-Town spots for years. This is the second part he’s dropped this week. The cat is definitely out of the bag. Check the full video by John Danielson (which includes Aaron Wilson’s part) on YouTube. Houston is the reason…

A skateboard film by Ryan Schorman and Johnathan McKenzie

A mix of acting and skateboarding by some old guys with major Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle vibes.

title: Rust Belt Trap
description: Amongst the crust of America’s Rust Belt, a rag-tag crew of skaters get the gumption to salvage the skateable scraps from truly decrepit spots. Jerry Mraz, Matt Andersen and Jake Baldini’s equally terrifying and inspiring new project will leave the sweet sound of clanking cellar doors ringing in your ears.

title: Roger - SUCKER PUNCH
description:
A new hit from your friend Roger and his gang fam. Featuring fresh professionals Garrett Young and Austin Amelio.

Rogers: Cosmo Martinez-Glenn, David Langston, Max Taylor, Ryan Thompson, Brian Gonterman, Max Jang, Marshall Manuel, and Reese Barton.

Film & Edit: Calvin Millar and Max Taylor
Graphics: Michael Sieben
Additional Filming: Bobby McCutchen, Chase Walker, Vincent Villagomez, Dylan Makar, Henry Giddens, Igna Arriagada, Israel Garcia, Matthew Whipps, Drew Pickles, Matt Munson.
